issues.shortMessage: Provide a getter for "CommonConfig" or replace the property with a "SetCommonConfig" method.
issues.fullMessage: Properties with only setters are confusing and counterintuitive. Instead, a property getter should be added if possible, or the property should be replaced with a setter method.

properties.title: Write-only properties should not be used

issues.fullMessage: Properties with only setters are confusing and counterintuitive. Instead, a property getter should be added if possible, or the property should be replaced with a setter method.
